tactic: apply H with (h:=h) (st':=st') (ps':=ps') (gd:=gd) in H0; auto.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable h (no bound variables at all in the expression).

original: simpl. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout. intros. apply H with (h:=h) (st':=st') (ps':=ps') (gd:=gd) in H0; auto. assert (forall p', In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) as H1 by auto. apply H1.
